section.name: Intro to CDM Dashboard Overview
section.summary:
This course provides participants with the essential knowledge of the latest version of the CDM Agency Dashboard available to the CISA Training Team. It explains basic features and navigation within the environment, includes demonstrations of many of the overview dashboards available in the CDM Agency Dashboard, and begins the discussion of how to identify and report on vulnerabilities.

Course Objectives:

The student will be able to:

  • Describe the goals of the CDM Program and CDM Agency Dashboard ​
  • Describe the basic CDM Dashboard Data Flow Architecture​
  • Describe some of the basic features of the CDM Agency Dashboard and Kibana
  • Identify the key components of the AWARE Scoring Algorithm​
  • Identify the vulnerabilities with the highest AWARE Score​

Please take a moment to download and view the presentation below before moving on to the next section within the course.
